entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snowshower, -4.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Medicine Hat Airport 2:11 PM MDT Monday 27 March 2023
Condition: Light Snowshower
Temperature: -4.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.1 kPa rising
Visibility: 1.6 km
Humidity: 81 %
Wind Chill: -11
Dewpoint: -7.0°C

entry.title: Monday: Flurries. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Flurries ending late this afternoon then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Monday 27 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Monday 27 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries late in the morning and early afternoon. Becoming sunny late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Monday 27 March 2023
